name: Desert Stars VR - ARABIC VERSION
summary: The Sahara Desert occupies one third of the African continent. Is one of the most inhospitable regions on the planet. The region is dry enough to mummify corpses and kill bacteria. Since 1975, Saharawi refugees have lived under these extreme conditions. Desert Stars VR is a 6doF experience where the participant can explore the scene while he/she listen to the storyes of the characters that appear during the narrative.
